headline: TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) Declares US$0.43 Quarterly Dividend for September 2025
summary: Recently, The TJX Companies (NYSE:TJX) affirmed a quarterly dividend of $0.425 per share, maintaining its commitment to return value to shareholders. The company's stock rose 9% over the last quarter, reflecting positive investor sentiment amid a buoyant market atmosphere. This price movement coincides with upward trends in the broader market, partially buoyed by easing inflation and ongoing U.S.-China trade talks. TJX's increased dividend announcements, as part of its capital return...
